comment: Congratulations on successfully defending your thesis!  It's understandable to be stressed out afterwards.  If I could, I'd give you a hug in person but this is the best I can do.  Rest up for now.
amr:
# ::snt Congratulations on successfully defending your thesis!  It's understandable to be stressed out afterwards.  If I could, I'd give you a hug in person but this is the best I can do.  Rest up for now.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / congratulate-01
            :ARG1 (y / you)
            :ARG2 (d / defend-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (t / thesis
                        :poss y)
                  :ARG1-of (s / succeed-01)))
      :snt2 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (u / understand-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / stress-out-03
                        :time (a / afterwards))))
      :snt3 (h / have-concession-91
            :ARG1 (h2 / hug-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (y2 / you)
                  :mod (ii2 / in-person))
            :ARG2 (g / good-02
                  :ARG1 h2
                  :ARG2-of (h3 / have-degree-91
                        :ARG1 h2
                        :ARG3 (m2 / most)
                        :ARG5 (p2 / possible-01
                              :ARG1 h2))))
      :snt4 (r / rest-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y3 / you)
            :time (n / now)))
